Question ID 214 - Resources to manage material impacts
Release date
March 2024
Question asked
In paragraph 43 of ESRS S1 (‘the undertaking shall disclose what resources are allocated to the
management of its material impacts, with information that allows users to gain an understanding
of how the material impacts are managed’), it is unclear whether ‘material impacts’ is meant to
cover all material impacts or only ‘own workforce’ material impacts.
